Find your future with us.Boeing Defense, Space and Security, Space and Launch division has an opening for a Senior Laser Communications Engineer/Physicist in El Segundo, CA., whose expertise will fall under photonics and laser communications in support of multiple programs . Position Overview:The Photonics/Optical/Infrared Sub-system/Systems Engineer/Physicist will be responsible for development, analysis, and optimization of electro-optical payloads, systems and subsystems on space platforms.  This engineer will posses a background in photonics or laser communications with a good understanding of general physics, optics or electromagnetics. This position requires sound technical judgment, and the ability to rapidly make and contribute to decisions that balance the overall architecture design.  As well as strong collaboration skills with customers and program team members to effectively create design concepts through measuring performance to requirements. This position requires strong organizational skills and adaptability to work in a fast-paced and continually changing environment.  The successful candidate must be able to clearly communicate photonic solutions to problems.Position Responsibilities:Responsible for the development of system and subsystem photonic architectures from existing and developmental designs and to analyze or test
